channel.title: People on Cryspen
channel.description: Recent content in People on Cryspen

item.title: Cryspen Welcomes Clara
item.description: We’re thrilled to officially welcome Clara to the Cryspen team! Clara brings a fantastic blend of experiences and a passion for open-source that aligns perfectly with our mission. Let’s get to know her a little better.

item.title: Cryspen Welcomes Maxime
item.description:
We’re thrilled to announce that Maxime Buyse has joined the Cryspen team as a Formal Verification Engineer! ðŸŽ‰

Maxime is a whiz when it comes to formal methods, software verification, compilers, and functional programming. His expertise will be instrumental in supercharging our tools like hax and making them even easier to use.
